name: stocks-app
description: A website that gives users access to all kinds of stock and cryptocurrency data.

scripts.start:dev: npm run build && npm run develop
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "wait-on tcp:3001 && cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
